articles.title: Paul Cattermole: S Club 7 star dies aged 46 - BBC
articles.description: The pop group, who announced a reunion in February, say they are "truly devastated" at his death.
articles.content:
S Club 7 star Paul Cattermole has died at the age of 46, weeks after the band announced a comeback tour.
